TopicTitle: Highest Delta V to land and return from?

Articles.Content:
Hey all, a 'simple' question, one of those ones..

I am looking to make an all round planetary mission ship, and am wondering when I get around to testing it, where is the planet/moon with the highest Delta V for a return trip to test it out on?

I have a long way to go in the design/test/crash phases, but hey, give me a heads up where I should be aiming at!

Is this to land, then get back to orbit and return to Kerbin? That would be Eve I think.

If it's just to get into orbit around the target, then return to Kerbin, then that would be Jool.

Eve. Definitely Eve.

Yep, Eve. I'm thinking of making an all round planetary ship, that can land and return from any body except Eve. Eve is just very hard.
Pretty interesting to hear about it. Eve.
